summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4765 for the improvement of The alley in Block 31, S. A. Bell's 2nd Addition, being the alley from Pike Street to Pine Street, between 9th Avenue and Terry Avenue; by grading and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 55165, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
